Game Rules

☆ Choose 1 to 5 numbers between 1 and 30 for one ticket and enter bet value for ticket between 1 and 20.

☆ Click on ADD TICKET button to submit ticket.

☆ You need to submit 5 tickets.

☆ With 5 tickets submited click on PLAY button to run numbers draw.

☆ After numbers has been drawn you will be able to see result - winning tickets will be colored green, the rest red.

☆ On the control panel you can see your overall balance - amount you have spent, won and total.

☆ Enjoy and have fun!
